pros: Great faith based environment. Really awesome coworkers. Lots of opportunities for growth and promotion
cons: Good wage for non-profit but still not great salary

pros: The quality and caliber of the disaster relief work in the field is exemplary.
cons: Salaries are on the low side.

review_title: Great environment for some, terrible for others
pros: Their project managers and field staff are amazing.
cons: Their senior leadership is sexist, ageist, and racist. If you're not a middle-aged white male, watch out.

review_title: You really need to be a true Good Samaritan to work here
pros: Overall purpose and mission of company is great since it fulfills the Great Commission to go and tell the world of God's GREAT love - and helping others in less fortunate or desperate circumstances
cons: Takes a toll on your personal life because you are always responding and working in the saddest, most devestating situations and staff expend themselves far beyond the call of duty to make things happen.  Expectations are placed on staff to volunteer for various events and functions.  Management unfortunately demonstrates favouritism and scrutinizes staff on unrealistic criteria for advancement

pros: Very helpful environment, supportive leaders and faith-based work.
